naslov: Okrug Gornji, APARTMANSKA KUĆA /razne namjene /POGLED MORE -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Poslovno-stambena samostojeća kuća/zgrada (RAZNE NAMJENE) s pogledom na more, udaljena cca 350 metara od plaže/mora. - brutto površina 603,82m2 - okućnica 473m2 .............................................................................. - završetak gradnje 1995.godine / zadnja adaptacija 2018.godine (adaptiran stan na 1.katu, krov, stavljena stiropor fasada) - napravljeni iskopi za bazen cca 40m2 - 3 do 4 parking mjesta + SUTEREN / PODRUM (poslovni prostor, skladište, sprema, strojarnica... ) 164,18m2 - nedovršeno (detalji na tlocrtu) + PRIZEMLJE (poslovni prostor) pogodan za poslovnu djelatnost ili apartmane 174,63m2 - nedovršeno (detalji na tlocrtu) + 1.KAT (jednosobni i dvosobni stan + terase) 136,63m2 - dovršeno 2018.godine + 2.KAT (jednosobni i dvosobni stan + terase) 128,39m2 - nedovršeno (detalji na tlocrtu) DETALJI I DETALJNE SLIKE NA UPIT! ENG..................................................................................... - exclusive sale of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. Business-residential detached house/building (VARIOUS PURPOSES) with sea view, approx. 350 meters from the beach/sea. - gross area 603.82m2 - garden plot 473m2 ................................................... ............................ - completion of construction in 1995 / last adaptation in 2018 (adapted apartment on the 1st floor, roof, Styrofoam facade installed) - excavations made for a pool of approx. 40m2 - 3 to 4 parking spaces + BASEMENT / BASEMENT (business space, storage, storage, engine room... ) 164.18m2 - unfinished (details on the floor plan) + GROUND FLOOR (business space) suitable for business activity or apartments 174.63m2 - unfinished (details on the floor plan) + 1ST FLOOR (one and two bedroom apartment + terraces) 136.63m2 - completed in 2018 + 2ND FLOOR (one and two bedroom apartment + terraces) 128.39m2 - unfinished (details on the floor plan) DETAILS AND DETAILED PICTURES ON REQUEST! #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
